settings.title: Caviar Delivery
settings.subtitle: Place your order today and enjoy the fresh caviar tomorrow with Bester Caviar's overnight free delivery! With our help, you don't need to worry about logistics, packaging, or quality — we have already taken care of everything, so you can simply pick your package, open the jar, and serve the caviar to your table.

settings.title: ARE YOU STILL WORRIED ABOUT BUYING CAVIAR NEAR YOU?
settings.text: If you still believe that you can get fresh caviar only by going to the local supplier, we have great news for you! Bester Caviar leverages a special packaging system that keeps your roes fresh during long-distance caviar delivery. No matter where you live in the United States, our caviar will come pristine and ready to be served and enjoyed as a stand-alone dish or an exquisite garnish to your table! Feel free to contact us if you want to learn more details about our delivery or join our caviar subscription

settings.title: CITIES WHERE OUR CAVIAR WAS RECOGNIZED
settings.text: We receive orders all over the United States. Make our order and help us expand our geography!

settings.title: Reasons why customers choose our caviar delivery service
settings.subtitle: Experience the ease and excellence of caviar shopping with Bester Caviar, as we make quality, convenience, and taste come together seamlessly.
settings.left_text: Best Caviar is the best place to buy caviar in the United States. Wherever you are located in the country, we will bring fresh, crisp roes to your doorstep. Use our online store to choose the preferred caviar and place an order. Then, you can put your concerns aside and relax, as we immediately initiate the process of shipping caviar to you. For a worry-free client experience, we establish an efficient delivery system. We offer FedEx/UPS overnight delivery throughout the USA from Monday to Friday.
settings.right_text: Even if you're located out of Miami, rest assured that you'll receive your caviar the very next day after placing your order, except on weekends. To ensure your caviar arrives in pristine condition, we've developed an innovative packaging system. We employ a three-layer approach, keeping the caviar cool within 24 hours. It starts with a cooling element, wrapped in aluminum foil, and covered with special thermo material, all meticulously designed to maintain the caviar's cold, fresh, and exquisite state upon delivery.

settings.sub_title: We invite you to familiarize yourself with the most popular products

settings.title: FREE OVERNIGHT DELIVERY
settings.text: Free Overnight Shipping in temperature controlled coolers for perishable goods Monday through Thursday & Same Day Free Delivery in Miami 24/7.

settings.title: PERSONALIZE YOUR ORDER WITH A GIFT CARD
settings.text: Send someone special Bester Caviar Gift Card so they can receive their fresh caviar when they are ready to indulge.

settings.text: Contact our caviar concierge to help you with your customized selection & delivery details: +1(813)510-9892 inna@besterusa.com

settings.title: AMAZON’S CHOICE
settings.text: Bester Caviar is best selling caviar brand on Amazon with over 500 positive customer reviews and Amazon’s Choice award: highly rated & well priced, ready to ship immediately.

settings.title: More and more quality service for our customers
settings.text: We work hard to make the caviar experience an exciting, satisfying event for you and your loved ones. Order caviar from us and enjoy the marvelous taste of top-class roes!
